messages.title: A strong, local voice...
messages.content: Ranil Jayawardena - our plan for North East Hampshire

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A track record of increasing funding for every pupil in every school, with more to come and new schools planned.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Revitalise and Regenerate Our Retail Centres
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Prioritising brownfield development to improve local communities and protect our countryside.
Working hard to improve services, reliability and capacity on the railway.
Boosting investment in fixing our roads locally... and taking bold investment decisions across our country.
Supporting local area with hundreds of extra police officers here in Hampshire to cut crime locally... and improving air quality by cutting emissions.
Getting on with cutting local GP waiting times, and building a new hospital in North Hampshire.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It’s a Conservative majority or a hung Parliament

issues.education: Increasing funding for every pupil in every school.
issues.environment: Improving air quality by cutting emissions.
issues.health: £33.9BN Extra for The NHS, cutting local GP waiting times, and building a new hospital in North Hampshire.

housing.content: Prioritising brownfield development to improve local communities and protect our countryside.

quotes.text: Don’t risk five long years of Corbyn in charge

leaflet.additionalNotes: Various news outlets cited indicating potential risks of a hung parliament and the position of other parties.
